data.actual_result: suggestions get selected by the cursor which makes you use the arrow keys or move the cursor again to select the one you actually want to use
data.expected_result: the cursor should not highlight the suggestion its placed on since im not moving it
data.short_description: [Canary] emotes, chat commands and @ suggestions get selected by the cursor if its placed where they popup before typing
data.steps_to_repro: - type something like ":reg" that shows a lot of suggestions - observe
